title: FS: T206 Cobb (Green Port.) PSA 8(MC), Green Cobbs are going crazy
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_content: Despite the qualifier, this card presents very nicely. Strong corners, beautiful color and registration, partial name at top.  Spotless and centered SCap 150 fact. 30 back. A straight PSA 8 recently sold for close to $200,000, and a PSA 7 sold for $75,000. Also, a PSA 5.5 just sold for $27,500 at Heritage, and a PSA 4 for $17,200 at Goldin last week.  There are no higher grades than a PSA 8 of this card (no 9's). This is a very strong card, great value compared to a straight PSA 7 or 8...Asking $40K, thanks for looking...I would consider a cash/trade deal...
Do you take kidneys? I have two in very good condition. Sharp Cobb Kevin!
Incredible card still available. None graded higher than an 8..

wow very nice!  The top/bottom OC isn't distracting, its actually kinda neat.  Much better than if it were OC left/right.  Good luck, beautiful card!
:)

Might wanna see what Heritage does with their Green Cobb PSA 8 opening Jan29th.
They have all 4 Cobbs graded 8's (the red, green and both bat versions)
Will be fun to watch those.

Ty available for $40K delivered, thanks for all the inquiries and kind words....Good luck
